General.Name: Miwon Holdings Co. Ltd
General.Description: Miwon Holdings Co., Ltd. produces and sells chemical products for UV/EB curing systems in Korea and internationally. The company offers acrylate and methacrylate monomers, oligomers, photo initiators, and other related fine chemicals. Its products are used in wood, metal, plastic, nail art, printing inks, adhesive, electronic, optical film, and CD/DVD/bluray applications. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Yongin, South Korea.
